author: Kathryn Gregory
text: The City of Peoria, AZ is looking to gather information from other agencies that have implemented self-certification for plan review and building inspections. What prompted you to start?  Did you hire a firm to research the options?  What would you say are the benefits and challenges?
title: Self Certfication for plan review; inspections
